Definition: This task requires you to read an English language product review and determine if it is positive or negative. A positive review is one where the product's review has a positive tone, and a negative review is one where the tone of the product's review is negative.

Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
